the puzzle is not too hard to solve it but its quietly take a moment to think for solving it, its relaxing and fun
Bought this game during the summer sale for pennies and I had an absolute blast. The story and mechanics were so good I felt guilty for getting it so cheap.
Best puzzle sci-fi game ever created !

Possibly the best written first person puzzle game that I've ever played. And definitely the funniest game full stop. If you liked Portal, this is essentially more of the same, albeit with wittier dialogue and a slightly wider scope with some fun new mechanics. It's also a bit more user friendly for first timers (the sharp edges from the first game having been polished off). Couldn't make a much higher recommendation.
tem uma historia bem interessante e uma otima jogabilidade

Great game, Lots of fun!
This game is perfect for people who like to solve some riddles and think logically.
Totally recommended.
